room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Would definitely come back and do it again! Great time had by all. Very good team building experience strengthening communication skills within the group as well.

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Super fun! Made you use your noggin and tested your ability to read between the lines, but wasn't so impossible that you didn't keep figuring things out til you were able to escape. Would definitely go back!

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: My friend and I booked a room on a Wednesday afternoon! It was one of the best experiences that we have had in a while! It was so much fun, we can't wait to come back!!

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Had a blast at this location!! Definitely challenges you and it was really cool working with strangers toward a common goal. The staff was helpful and nice. Would definitely recommend and will be making another visit!!

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Katie and I had a great time in the Amazing Escape Room...great times and lots of pics with friends... lots of laughs and tears...I would definitely do it again. You guys have to try it out at least once...we are going back

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This place is awesome!!! I was there yesterday, January 31st, and the place was really cool. Had a great time with my family and guess what? Hines Ward, Steelers Great, was there with his family. Double treat for me because I love Escape Rooms and am a lifelong Steelers fan! Never know who might be in your room with you when you go through.

room_title: Escape room "Roaring 20's" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: First time here on a date and we chose the Roaring 20's room with no idea what was to come. We had THE most amazing time! We made it to the last puzzle, but didn't get out in time. Now we are hooked and ended up staying to do the Desert Storm room. Very challenging but we made it out of this one with minutes to spare! So exciting and brain exercising, perfect place for a second or third date.
